resources.string: Welcome to the club calendar app.
Click on the red floating Button to add new Events.
Click on an Event to edit it.
Long press on an Event to delete it.
Kindly delete an event once its over.\n We are trying to add auto-delete feature to the app, once its over.

Good Luck!!
Feel free to contact the developers in case of any difficulty.
 Email:- gaurv1407@gmail.com
Phone:- +916200694236
